extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Hormones in endocrine system and Repulsor technology in Iron Man have modularity as a key aspect
extended_metaphor.hormones: Hormones serve as signaling modules ensuring proper communication between different components of the endocrine system, guiding important processes such as growth, metabolism, and reproduction.
extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Similarly, Repulsor technology in Iron Man functions as modular components that allow seamless integration and communication between different parts of the suit, enabling Tony Stark to control and direct the energy output effectively.

extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Likewise, Repulsor technology in Iron Man is engineered with precise specifications to control the energy output and direct it to specific targets, allowing Tony Stark to use the technology with accuracy and efficiency.
